tgt_original: vairocana mahāśuddha vajraśānta mahārate |  prakṛtiprabhāsvarāgrāgrya deśavajra namo'stu te ||96 ||
sarvakarmakṛtārakṣya dhyāyāddhṛtkaṇṭhamūrddhasu |  vajramabjaṃ tathā cakraṃ hū āḥ om teṣu vinyaset ||197 ||
hṛcchiraḥ kaṇṭhamālabhya dadyātpuṣpādikaṃ kramāt ||198 ||  puṣpaṃ mūrdhni puro dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhaṃ punarhṛdi |  dadyātsarvakṛtājaptaṃ śiṣyebhyo yati rādarāt ||199 ||
prāgudaṅmukhasaṃsthaistaiḥ khādayitvaiva prakṣipet |  gocarmamātrabhū lipte siddhiṃ śāntyādikāṃ diśet ||201 ||
sūtraiḥ surakṣayet ||202 ||  tricalupānamantraḥ-om hrīḥ viśuddhadharma sarvapāpāni cāsya śodhaya sarvavikalpānapanaya hū |
tatsarvaṃ hi kṣayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā maṇḍalamīdṛśam ||205 ||
kimutānantayaśasāṃ mantracaryānaye sthitaḥ |  padaṃ hyanuttaraṃ yāti japanvai mantra(ntraṃ) tāyinām ||206 ||
ucchinnā durgati steṣāṃ sarvaduḥkhasya sambhavā |  yeṣāṃ caryāvare hyasminmatiratyantanirmalā ||207 ||
yena yūyaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ saputrairiha śāsane ||208 ||  sarve parigṛhītāḥ stha jāyamānā mahātmabhiḥ |
sarvajñānāṃ kadā loke sambhavo jāyate na vā |  udumbarasyai(sye)
nirdoṣaḥ śāśvataścāsi sarvarāgānurāgaṇa |  tattvena siddha me bhagavan mahārāgo mahārata ||284 ||
samantabhadra sarvātmā bodhisattva prasiddha me ||285 ||  sarvottamamahāsiddhimāhaiśvaryāgramudrayā |
tena satyena me nātha kāmāṃstvaṃ paripūraya ||288 ||
bodhicittaṃ na vai tyājyaṃ yadvajramiti mudrayā |
